name: 11th Dream
detailed_description:
0X0010 IN HISTORY
0X0020 BEFORE BOTS
0X0030 BIOLOGICAL MIND
0X0040 CREATED TOOLS FOR LACK
0X0050 OF POWERS AND FATIGUE
0X0060 TOOLS AGAINST UNCOMFORT OF WORK

0X0010 AFTER BIOLOGICAL HISTORY
0X0020 WHEN BOTS BECAME
0X0030 TOOLS FOR OTHER TOOLS
0X0040 WITH NO WORK
0X0050 BUT UNCOMFORTABLE.
0X0060 THE SYSTEM STARTED TO FAINT

11th Dream Game is fast-paced third person abstract shooter. 11th Includes both skirmish maps and campaign aimed at fast runners and hard-core difficulty enthusiasts. It is a game that you can try to beat while you render your video, waiting for the meeting or for a reply from your friend.
Besides the solo-hardcore experience, 11th Dream delivers fully scrip-table in-game map editor, daily scoreboards to compete with other players and full on-line stats and leader-boards.

To bring vapor of dream gaming to your screen, we are going through rather bizarre development flow using our own custom engine. Absence of accessible technology supports our imagination, breaking visuals and also drives us to create new artistic approaches to fast 3D shooter genre.

Key Features

  • Single-Player Story Campaign
  • Fast Paced Hardcore Game-play
  • Arena Skirmish Maps
  • In-Game Level Editor
  • Daily (TBD) and scoreboards

“You should add photosensitivity warning!”
-J. Doe

short_description: After biological history. When bots became tools for other tools. The system started to faint.«« 11th Dream is a fast-paced third person abstract shooter aimed at fast runners and hard-core difficulty enthusiasts.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Gen
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Graphics card compatible with OpenGL 3.3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-3350P
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
